column4: do you have ssh server installed on the server you have the vsftpd installed?

What the? http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2012912/Firefox-strange.png (Error message states: "Content type failure: Page which you are trying to view cannot be shown due to a wrong compression method. Please contact the website owners and let them know of this problem")... On Opera it works fine... !?
I've had an issue in the past and i figured out that when ssh server is on the machine and i installed vsftpd it used sftp (port22)
I think you're mistaken, I'm not the person with this problem, JStoone is
